definition: to deposit money (in a bank etc)/bank savings/bank deposit
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

pinyin: cun2 kuan3 zhun3 bei4 jin1 lu:4

sentences.english: The deposit insurance fund fell into the red in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 存款保险资金在2009年进入红色警戒区。

sentences.english: Do we get a salary slip even if we sign up for direct deposit ?
sentences.chinese: 如果工资直接存款的话，能拿到工资条吗？

sentences.english: The first part is the summary of correlative theories on DIS.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分是存款保险制度相关理论的概述。

sentences.english: Please fill in this deposit slip first.
sentences.chinese: 请先填写这张存款凭条。

sentences.english: Slide 7: Save for retirement starting with your first pay check.
sentences.chinese: 退休存款从你的第一张工资条开始。
银行存款有一部分被提回了。

sentences.english: What’s the interest rate for demand deposits?
The bank also is barred from taking deposits, which means higher financing costs.
sentences.chinese: 农发行也不能吸引存款，这意味着它的融资成本较高。

sentences.english: Banks are reducing their dependence on wholesale funding and increasing their reliance on "stickier" deposits.
sentences.chinese: 银行正减少对批发融资的依赖，转而依靠粘性存款。

sentences.english: To create waste is to waste our hard-earned money, and our savings.
sentences.chinese: 制造垃圾，就是在乱花自己辛苦挣来的金钱与存款。

sentences.english: The money is probably loans coming back to banks as deposits.
sentences.chinese: 投出的信贷很可能以存款的方式又回到了银行。

sentences.english: In practice, coverage is set up in many economies to reduce moral hazard.
sentences.chinese: 为此，实践中许多经济体对存款保额人为设定上限。

sentences.english: Money deposited for checking savings or brokerage use.
sentences.chinese: 存款为支付，节省，或经纪业而存起来的钱。

sentences.english: The raising of deposit insurance limit will help increase bank depositors confidence in their banks.
sentences.chinese: 提升存款保险极限将帮助增加他们的银行存户信心。

sentences.english: Establishing a deposit policy for works in progress.
sentences.chinese: 为在进度中的工程建立存款制度。

sentences.english: I would like to open a current deposit account with your bank.
sentences.chinese: 我想在贵行开一个活期存款账户。

definition: to be in debt/to incur debts/liability (finance)
certificate of deposit/time deposit/abbr. for 定期存款|定期存款[ding4 qi1 cun2 kuan3]
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
